simergy.core.resources

Class HealthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • simergy.core.resources.Resource
      • simergy.core.resources.NonHumanResource
        • simergy.core.resources.HealthService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BloodTest, MRI, Radiography

    public abstract class HealthService
extends NonHumanResource
    The Class HealthService. This abstract class represents a health service of the ED, adding a waiting queue and a probability distribution used to set the duration of an examination.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
